text:
-Archimedes Colony.
"Pillar of Light" lower floor,
Entrance Hall.

name: Denebola
text:
...Gh!
Monsters are gathering
outside again.

Denebola, who had been tending to the fallen people,
placed his hand on his waist pouch and stood up.

Inside, various types of Parallel Weapons,
such as projectile weapons and knife-type weapons,
were stored.

name: Denebola
text:
...No, there are people in need of rescue nearby.
Should I engage in close combat and
distance the monsters?

Muttering that, he glared outside the entrance,
and just as he put strength into his claws.

name: Flamier
text:
-Excuse me!
Please watch out for the surrounding blast waves!

name: Flamier
text:
Now, bloom beautifully-!
-"Chain Explosion", Happy♡Flower Time!!

After a sudden burst of colorful light,
with a slight delay, sound and blast waves
swept through.

name: Denebola
text:
-What!?
T-The monsters were blown away...!?

name: Flamier
text:
...Andrew!
There are still some of them left!

name: Andrew
text:
Understood, My Lady!
Leave the rest to me.

name: Andrew
text:
I'll hold them back even if it means
of using my body as a shield!
-"Transformation", Gemini's Decider!!

name: Yoshiori
text:
I'm pretty used to it now, but still,
that young lady's Parallel Weapon
is beyond flashy...

name: Subaru
text:
...The power is unbelievable for what seems to be a flashy technique.
It seems all the surrounding monsters
have been swept away.

name: Flamier
text:
I am honored by your praise. However,
it's difficult to adjust if it's not an open space.
I'll guard the outside, alright?

name: Ryekie
text:
It's the same for me! If I use a powerful technique indoors,
I might electrocute the surroundings!
Let's guard the outside together!!

name: Sui
text:
Then, I'll be guarding the entrance-
Oh! Isn't that person... Denebola-san!?

Denebola, who had been taken aback by the sudden blast,
regained his composure and
rushed towards the heroes.

name: Denebola
text:
Ah, ah!
You're the ones [Player]
was talking to!

name: Denebola
text:
Thanks for the support, I appreciate it.
As you already know, I'm Denebola.

name: Huckle
text:
Nice to meet you, Denebola-san.
I've heard about you from
[Player]-kun.

name: Mokdai
text:
We'd like to introduce ourselves first,
but rescue is the priority now.

name: Mokdai
text:
Denebola-san, are those people behind you
the people you've rescued from inside the monsters?

name: Denebola
text:
Ah, yes. They're still unconscious.
I've confirmed they're not injured,
but I want to transport them to a place where they can rest quietly.

name: Mokdai
text:
Understood. In that case,
we need to transport them to
where the medical heroes are.

name: Akashi
text:
Alright, Mokdai and I will carry them.
Denebola-san, please stay and share your information with them.
I'll introduce myself properly when I get back!

name: Monomasa
text:
If it's an escort, we'll need manpower,
so I'll lend a hand too.
Melide... I'll be right back.

name: Melide
text:
Yes, understood.
Please, Monomasa.

name: Exio
text:
Then I'll help with the outside operation.
Yoshiori-kun, stay with Melide.

name: Yoshiori
text:
Understood, Exio-san!
Leave this side to me!

The heroes who rushed from outside,
divided their tasks and solidified the defense
around the entrance.

Flamier, Ryekie, and Exio went outside.
Mokdai, Akashi, and Monomasa
started moving, carrying the rescued individuals.

name: Denebola
text:
...Such efficiency.
Is this what real heroes are like?

name: Crowne
text:
Hahaha, you'll probably join our ranks soon, won't you?
I was watching your movements from the observation seats.

name: Denebola
text:
Eh, i-is that so!?
I've been running around without being able to transform at all
since the exam started, but...

name: Crowne
text:
This exam has turned into quite a commotion.
But, you'll surely get your license!

name: Sui
text:
By the way, both of you,
I'm a little curious...

name: Sui
text:
Those machine parts lying there,
it looks out of place, but did those
also come out of the monsters?

Sui pointed to the spaceship parts
lined up at Denebola's feet.

name: Denebola
text:
Ah, no, those belong to Orbiter.
They're parts of a small spaceship, apparently.
Yes, let's talk about that too.

name: Andrew
text:
...This is Orbiter's spaceship's...
I see, you were with them.

name: Denebola
text:
Ah. With him, I, Pubraseer, and [Player]
were acting as a group of four.

name: Denebola
text: And, plus two extra villains.

name: Hydoor
text:
...Hm?
Hey, you said you are Denebola, right?
I have a part like that too.

Hydoor took out the part he had put
in his pouch and showed it to Denebola.

name: Subaru
text:
Ah, that was the object caught on the tree, right?
Thinking about it again, you wouldn't intentionally
throw something like that in such a place.

name: Melide
text:
...I recognize it too.
Could this part that
I have also belong with them?

name: Melide
text:
In the end, I couldn't even deliver it to the police box...
The owner must be nearby, then.

Melide also took out the part
she was carrying.

Although their shapes differed, all of them had a similar texture,
indicating that they originated from the same thing.

name: Crowne
text:
It's small, but this is the engine.
And, the seat and the rudder.
Melide's looks like a foldable shield...

name: Crowne
text:
There seem to be some missing
parts and screws here and there, but...
It looks like we can manage with what we have.

name: Subaru
text:
You said this was a small spaceship?
It's like a folding bicycle.
Why is there such a thing...?

name: Denebola
text:
Ah, to explain from the beginning,
when I and [Player] met-

Denebola explained the events so far,
including the circumstances,
to the remaining members on site.

As they listened to the chaotic situation,
the heroes' expressions gradually
grew sterner.

name: Huckle
text:
...I see.
So, [Player] and the others
went up to the upper floor.

name: Denebola
text:
Ah, [Player] said that the main body
of the monsters should be somewhere
up there.

name: Denebola
text:
Surely, they were tracking its presence
with their "Observer"'s observation ability.

name: Crowne
text:
-Everyone, breaking news!
I got a message from [Player]!

Crowne opened her terminal
and checked the contents.

name: Crowne
text:
...It seems they've reached the control room
that handles the warp system.

name: Crowne
text:
I even received the warp logs from the system.
I'm curious how they extracted such specialized information, but-

name: Crowne
text:
Currently, [Player] and the others are in the control area
of the Ether Reactor, beyond the control room.

name: Sui
text:
Ether Reactor...?
That's the facility that converts Ether into energy, right?

name: Crowne
text:
Ah, that's right.
It's the colony's lifeblood.

name: Crowne
text:
...And the main body of the monsters
is apparently there.

At Crowne's words, everyone
showed expressions of surprise.

name: Hydoor
text:
Are you serious...?
If anything happens to that,
it's more than just a big deal.

name: Melide
text:
Yoshiori-niichan.
If the Ether Reactor were to break-

name: Melide
text: What would happen to the Archimedes Colony?

name: Yoshiori
text:
...At the very least, if it exploded,
humans wouldn't be able to live
in the colony.

name: Yoshiori
text:
Besides, it's such a massive energy source.
If a huge explosion were to occur, it wouldn't be strange if
the entire surrounding area is blown away...

name: Subaru
text:
The ceiling covering the colony is
resistant to external impacts, but
it's the same for the inside-

name: Subaru
text:
Conversely, it means there's no way to dissipate
damage generated internally to the outside.

name: Andrew
text:
It means there's a high possibility
of extensive damage.

name: Andrew
text:
I'll immediately inform My Lady outside!
-Everyone, can you gather up!?

name: Denebola
text:
"My Lady"...?
Wasn't that the fireworks person from earlier?
Why is her name coming up here...?

name: Huckle
text:
Flamier R. Astridam, affiliated with Heroic Educators.
She is the Chairman of Archimedes Corp.,
which bears the colony's name- her daughter.

name: Huckle
text:
Meaning, she's the VIP of VIPs
in this colony.

name: Denebola
text: Haaaaaaah...!?

-"Pillar of Light" upper floor,
Ether Reactor Room.

[Player] and the others continued
to sweep away the massive number of monsters
that kept pouring out.

name: Orbiter
text:
-Captain, Gaisei!
Be careful, the monsters are
leaping at you!

name: Orbiter
text:
Understood!
[Player], send
ViewPower to me!

name: Orbiter
text:
I'll deploy a field that's easy to fight in!
-"Adventure"! Gravity Well!!

Orbiter deployed a gravity field
around him.

Pubraseer and Gaisei, who were inside, gained an attractive force,
and the monsters approached with slowed movements.

name: Gaisei
text:
Deploying a favorable battlefield for oneself,
a technique focused on support.
Indeed, very interesting.

name: Yotaro
text:
Gaisei-kun, let's take down the enemies in front of us first!
I'll send you ViewPower!

name: Gaisei
text:
Very well. If the enemy tries to crush me with sheer numbers,
then I shall show them a power that surpasses theirs.

name: Gaisei
text:
I shall slice through all the enemies...!
-"Battle Blade"
Demon's Claw of Destruction, First Form!

Gaisei cheerfully
sliced through the monsters, laughing.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
[Player], let's aim for where Gaisei's
blade can't reach.
Leave the enemies in the back to me!

As ViewPower was sent,
Pubraseer's Parallel Weapon
began to glow even brighter.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...You monsters who devour the future,
not a single one shall escape!

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Come, my friends!
-"Polaris", Pénte Anamniseis!!

The light of the energy body pierced
the cores of the attacking monsters.

However, all the defeated monsters
were split bodies, as they vanished into thin air
the moment they were destroyed.

name: Yotaro
text:
...This is strange.
[Player], look.

Looking around, Yotaro, with a stern gaze,
spoke to [Player].

name: Yotaro
text:
The monsters that were coming towards us
are now heading deeper-
towards the Ether Reactor.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...You're right.
Their attacks seem to have completely stopped.

The remaining monsters moved away
from [Player] and the others.

Then, in swarms, they began to bite
into the spherical power core of the reactor.

name: Gaisei
text:
Showing one's back during combat is not amusing.
It just shows a lack of strength.

name: Gaisei
text:
...However, if these monsters
become an obstacle to my battle with [Player]-dono-

Just as he raised his weapon and was about to lunge at the enemy
with a swaying motion, Yotaro grasped his sleeve and stopped him.

name: Yotaro
text:
-Wait, Gaisei-kun.
The situation with those monsters and the reactor...
It's probably much worse than you can imagine.

name: Gaisei
text:
..."Observer."
What does that mean?

name: Yotaro
text:
Look closely. I thought the monsters were just
biting the reactor, but the smell is strange.

name: Yotaro
text:
The reactor's smell is getting more and more
mixed into them... they're assimilating.
It's like a "complete fusion."

name: Yotaro
text:
Yes, the boundary seems to be getting
more and more ambiguous...

name: Yotaro
text:
The reactor currently being predated
upon looks very unstable.
If we carelessly attack the monsters-

name: Yotaro
text:
There's a high possibility that
the reactor will explode.

name: Orbiter
text:
The reactor will explode...!?
If that happens, we too...!

name: Yotaro
text:
Besides, even without considering the reactor,
if the monsters are gathering, they'll mature, right?

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...Ah, that's a plausible scenario.
Once they become adults, they'll be able to
physically interfere with this universe.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
If that happens, they'll become uncontrollable.
The "Pillar of Light" won't be safe either.

Yotaro nodded at Orbiter's words,
and questioned [Player].

name: Yotaro
text:
I'm starting to understand the situation.
I have one more thing I'm curious about, though...

name: Yotaro
text:
[Player], don't you feel a strange
sensation in the flow of Ether around here?

options.text: I feel like the Ether is moving...

text:
[Player] and Yotaro nodded to each other,
confirming the unusual sensation they both felt.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Moving Ether?
What does that mean?

name: Yotaro
text:
We, as "Observers," can
consciously perceive the flow of Ether.

name: Yotaro
text:
Naturally occurring Ether
flows gently and slowly, but-

name: Yotaro
text:
Around here, it's flowing as if it's
being sucked into that reactor.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Is that so?
It's certainly strange, to be able to
feel the sensation of something invisible.

name: Yotaro
text:
This is a sensation that only
an "Observer" would understand.

name: Yotaro
text:
Even so, today,
the Ether was moving strangely,
just like a whirlpool-

name: Yotaro
text:
This place is even stranger.
Is it because of the reactor that
it's like this...?

[Player] pointed to themselves
and told Yotaro.

options.text: Around me, it swirls on its own, like...
Ether just moves on its own around me, you see.

name: Orbiter
text:
Heh, that's amazing!
[Player] can move the surrounding Ether!

name: Yotaro
text:
I see, so that's how it is.
............

name: Yotaro
text:
...Eh, wait.
What does that mean?
You can move Ether...?

options.text: To be precise, it swirls on its own.
Please excuse me from the details for now.
It might be my unique ability...?

name: Yotaro
text:
...I-I see?
Is this what Gaisei-kun calls
"exceptional"...?

name: Yotaro
text:
Understood, it's an urgent situation now,
so I'll just swallow everything and
understand it that way for now.

name: Yotaro
text:
That's what I think,
but [Player], your power to swirl Ether,
and the reactor's suction power-

name: Yotaro
text:
Those two powers are making the flow of Ether
around here strange... is that it?

Yotaro shook his head slightly
as he looked at [Player].

name: Gaisei
text:
...So what?
In the end, the goal of defeating monsters
hasn't changed.

name: Gaisei
text:
No matter what happens to the Ether,
we just have to defeat the monsters quickly.

name: Yotaro
text:
Gaisei-kun, like I said earlier,
if we provoke them carelessly, there's a possibility of us
dealing catastrophic damage to the reactor.

name: Yotaro
text:
They're so densely packed around the reactor,
so how do you plan to defeat only the monsters?

Yotaro turned his gaze to the reactor,
which was becoming a mass of monsters.

The monsters weren't attacking,
but they were squirming around,
accumulating power for themselves.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...It seems, from what I can tell,
there's not much time left
until they fully mature.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Hey, [Player]. What you just said means
that we need to defeat the monsters,
but we can't destroy the reactor, right?

options.text: ...If it explodes, it's all over for us.

text:
At [Player]'s reply,
Orbiter let out a groan.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Hmm, then,
I'll ask "the person in my heart"
if there's any way.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
"The person in my heart"...?
Orbiter, what do you mean by that?

name: Orbiter
text:
It's hard to explain, but...
If I call out to "the person in my heart"
and ask them questions, they will teach me many things.

name: Orbiter
text:
They have the same name as me,
they're also called "Orbiter".

name: Orbiter
text:
I even learned how to build a
small spaceship from them!
...Just a moment, alright?

Saying that, Orbiter
placed his hand on his chest and
showed a closed-eye expression on his display.

name: Orbiter
text:
『Yoo-hoo, Orbiter!』
I want to know how to defeat
the monsters without destroying the reactor.

Orbiter spoke quietly.
After a while, Orbiter's
face display opened its eyes.

name: Orbiter
text:
-Yeah, I asked.
It's...
You guys didn't hear anything, right?

name: Gaisei
text:
Nothing to this unworthy one's ears.
Were you really talking
to someone?

name: Orbiter
text:
I'm telling the truth!
They really taught me properly.

name: Orbiter
text:
Uhm... switch the reactor to emergency power, right?
Then, transport the reactor into space-

name: Orbiter
text:
And there, destroy the monsters' core.
That way, we can retrieve the reactor later, he said.

name: Orbiter
text:
He said we could use the maintenance elevator
that leads to space to transport the reactor.

Everyone showed expressions of surprise
at Orbiter's words.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...I-Indeed.
With that method, even in the worst case,
an explosion within the colony can be prevented.

name: Yotaro
text:
R-Right...
In a dire emergency, we can defeat the monsters
along with the reactor in outer space.

name: Yotaro
text:
But if we destroy the reactor,
the energy supply from the Ether
will also temporarily stop.

name: Yotaro
text:
At the very least, people won't
be able to live in the Archimedes Colony,
will they?

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
However, given enough time,
it's possible to prepare a new reactor
and rebuild it.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
If it's a choice between life and death,
we should not hesitate.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
No matter what,
we must make choices
that allow us to survive.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Life or death, huh?
............

At Pubraseer's words,
Gaisei quietly pondered.

options.text: As expected, we can't decide this on our own.
I want to consult the agency...

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Ah... that's right.
The fate of the colony depends on it.
We cannot make a hasty decision.

Nodding at Pubraseer's words,
[Player] activated their terminal and
connected to Huckle.

Chapter 7:
Overlapping Bonds - Part 1

options.text: We're moving ahead just in case.

name: Huckle
text:
-I see.
I understand, thank you,
[Player]-kun.

With the communication connecting the upper
and lower floors of the "Pillar of Light",[Player] and
the others once again reported on the current situation.

After hearing the plan,
the heroes on the lower floor groaned,
with difficult expressions on their faces.

name: Subaru
text:
The monsters are being drawn into
the Ether of the reactor, and assimilating themselves...
Is that right?

name: Subaru
text:
It was a similar situation
when we met [Player]-san and the others,
wasn't it?

name: Exio
text:
These monsters, too, must be drawn
to the reactor's Ether, right?

name: Huckle
text:
...Indeed. We would like to send
support members immediately from here,
but that alone won't solve the problem.

name: Hydoor
text:
But, the split bodies are also
coming towards the entrance.

name: Hydoor
text:
Even now, Sui, Justice,
and Yoshiori are fighting outside, but-

name: Hydoor
text:
If we don't crush them here,
they'll head towards [Player] and the others, right?

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
From what I can tell about the state of the monsters' main body,
it seems there's no time to launch the elevator
after regrouping with everyone.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...If we don't act quickly,
the damage will likely be greater.

Amidst the heavy conversation,
Exio asked [Player] a question.

name: Exio
text:
-[Player]-kun.
Regarding what we just discussed, I have one question.

name: Exio
text:
About the Ether flow, is the Ether "only"
being drawn towards the reactor?
Exio continued speaking to [Player]'s answer.

name: Exio
text:
...I see.
Were there any other anomalies?
Could you tell me in detail?

name: Exio
text:
That reactor seems to have functions to convert
absorbed Ether into energy, and to return it to
the atmosphere to maintain a constant concentration.

name: Yotaro
text:
...What's wrong?
If that function is working normally,
it seems that there shouldn't be a problem...

name: Exio
text:
...It's the opposite, that is the strange thing.
I can understand that the reactor
has a mechanism to absorb Ether.

name: Exio
text:
However, if the Ether is being devoured by the monsters,
that flow should be interrupted there.

name: Yotaro
text: ...Eh, the monsters consume Ether?

name: Melide
text:
Yes, that's right.
That's why monsters seem to be
drawn to Ether.

name: Melide
text:
Exio-sama, in that case,
what state is that reactor in now...?

name: Exio
text:
If [Player]-kun's senses are correct, and the Ether flow
hasn't ceased from where it was devoured-

name: Exio
text:
Then the monsters there
also possesses the properties
of a reactor.

name: Huckle
text:
Monsters, also possessing the properties of a reactor...?
What kind of situation is that?

name: Exio
text:
It seems the reactor and the monsters have
started to transition into a "superimposed state."

Everyone turned their gaze to Exio,
waiting for the next explanation.

name: Exio
text:
-A vast amount of Ether and monsters,
as beings from a parallel universe,
are highly compatible.

name: Exio
text:
Because they can have their existence
in this universe reinforced by Ether.

name: Exio
text:
And, the monsters-
Ether bodies in a superimposed state
can influence each other.

name: Exio
text:
In other words, if you destroy the monsters' core,
the reactor will also be destroyed.
It would be impossible to destroy only one or the other.

name: Exio
text:
...It's a very rare phenomenon,
but I've encountered monsters in a similar state before.

name: Denebola
text:
...Sorry, thinking isn't my forte,
but does that mean that to protect the colony,
if we defeat the monsters-

name: Denebola
text:
The reactor will be destroyed at the same time,
and we won't be able to live in this colony anymore,
is that correct?

name: Exio
text:
............
Yes, that's correct.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Hey, [Player].
If the reactor explodes in space,
the Ether will scatter too, right?

name: Orbiter
text:
If monsters are drawn to Ether,
wouldn't that also be dangerous...?

options.text: So, destroying it outside isn't the solution either, huh...

name: Crowne
text:
Right.
The Ether concentration around the colony will increase,
and it's highly likely to attract monsters.

name: Huckle
text:
...And, in the previous plan,
you were going to go into space and
confront the monsters there, right?

name: Huckle
text:
If the reactor explodes,
you, who are fighting nearby,
...wouldn't make it out unscathed.

name: Huckle
text:
...It concerns your lives.
I-I cannot permit that...
[Player] interrupted Huckle's words.

name: Huckle
text:
...[Player]-kun.
No, I cannot allow you all
to face such danger.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
............
President Huckle, if I may.

Pubraseer put his hand on [Player]'s shoulder
and stepped forward.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
I too, feel the same way as you.
I cannot agree to send
my friends to their death.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...However, we are heroes.
If everyone's lives are at stake,
I... want to do what I can.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
At first, both [Player] and I,
everyone, were just caught up in this-

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
But now, we are here by our own will,
to defeat the monsters.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
-Please, could you put your trust in us with hope?
We promise to return alive, no matter what.

name: Huckle
text:
Pubraseer-san...
............
...Understood.

Huckle gazed at Pubraseer's
straightforward gaze, and
then nodded in response.

name: Huckle
text:
...In that case, until the very last moment,
let's prevent the reactor from exploding,
and search for a way to defeat the monsters.

name: Huckle
text:
The lives of the people living in the colony,
and their livelihoods. And [Player] and the others,
who are facing this battle-

name: Huckle
text:
You will search for an option that doesn't involve
giving up on any of them until the very last moment.
You'll promise me that, won't you?

name: Huckle
text:
...Thank you, [Player]-kun.
Of course, we will also search for that method.

Flamier, who had been listening,
stepped forward.

name: Flamier
text:
...Understood.
Everyone, as the representative of the colony,
I also ask this of you.

name: Flamier
text:
I have also contacted my father,
and we are asking the citizens
to evacuate to nearby colonies as quickly as possible.

name: Andrew
text:
Orbiter, you're safe.
I was worried about you.

name: Flamier
text:
...Orbiter-san, you suddenly disappeared,
so I was very surprised, but-

name: Flamier
text:
I'm relieved to see you well.
...Please, do not get injured.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Flamier, Andrew.
I'm sorry for disappearing without a word...

name: Orbiter
text:
...Uhm.
Apologizing now isn't enough, is it?
When I return, I'll definitely let you scold me!

name: Orbiter
text:
I'll apologize properly there.
I'll definitely return with [Player] and Captain!

At Orbiter's words,
Flamier and Andrew smiled and nodded.

name: Andrew
text:
...[Player]-san.
With Orbiter by your side, please,
I ask you to take care of him.

Huckle clapped his hands
in response to Andrew's nod.

name: Huckle
text:
Since that's settled,
there's no time to hesitate.
Everyone, let's move immediately!

name: Denebola
text:
Understood, [Player].
I'll stop the split bodies
from heading to your location.

name: Crowne
text:
Ah, I'm not really good at giving up either,
so leave the thinking to me.
[Player], be careful.

name: Crowne
text:
If I find anything, no matter where you are in space,
I'll definitely deliver it right away.
-With this!
Crowne patted Orbiter's spaceship part.

name: Orbiter
text:
Ah, my spaceship!
All the parts are there...!

name: Crowne
text:
Ah, you're Orbiter, right?
I know it's something important to you,
but I'm borrowing it for a bit.

name: Crowne
text:
In return,
I'll repair it properly.

name: Orbiter
text:
Yay-!
Thank you, Crowne!

Ending the call there,
[Player] turned around.

There, Gaisei, who had released his transformation,
was gazing blankly at the reactor,
with no intention of joining the conversation.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Are we done?
I can't battle, and those monsters
show no sign of attacking.

name: Gaisei
text:
This unworthy one is bored.
What will you do now?

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
There's no time to be bored, Gaisei.
The monsters are surely approaching maturity.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
You might have heard,
but if we defeat those monsters,
the reactor will also be destroyed at the same time.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
If we don't find a solution,
...there won't be a future waiting for us.

name: Gaisei
text:
-Future, huh?
The only thing this unworthy one
seeks in the future is strength.

options.text: Gaisei, why do you seek strength?
You're only interested in battles, huh...

name: Gaisei
text:
...Oh, [Player]-dono.
Are you interested in this unworthy one?

name: Gaisei
text:
However, if I may be so bold,
it's a trivial and boring reason.
It's not worth talking about.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
-No, Gaisei.
Could you tell me your story?
Why do you seek strength?
Pubraseer spoke to Gaisei with a serious expression.

name: Yotaro
text:
...But, is that alright?
The monsters will soon mature.

name: Yotaro
text:
At this time, chatting...
I don't think we have time for that.

name: Orbiter
text:
Th-That's right, Captain.
Now we can wait for the elevator,
but there are monsters right in front of us...!

Pubraseer shook his head slightly
at Yotaro's and Orbiter's words.

He glanced sideways at the squirming monsters,
but Pubraseer slowly looked around to everyone's faces.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...It's precisely because we are in imminent danger,
we must become one "team".

name: Orbiter
text:
...We are a team.
............

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Us, who are scattered ourselves,
can only exert individual power, but if we
become a team, it's a different story.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
The strength of a team
far exceeds that of individuals.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
For each person to deepen their understanding
of each other, and cooperate- that is what I believe to be
the way to escape this predicament.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Hoh, a power that surpasses individual strength,
a greater power, you say?
Fascinating, I'm interested.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Right, I'm also interested in people who start
introducing themselves seriously in this situation.
It's what you call "unprecedented."

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Hahaha, that's fine.
I'm also interested in you. So, tell me again,
about yourselves, won't you?

Pubraseer laughed, as if the
urgent situation was all just a lie.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Very well.
You also possess true strength.
Just like [Player]-dono.

name: Gaisei
text:
If this unworthy one's insignificant
story of the past leads to strength,
then I shall tell it.

Gaisei continued speaking with
his usual listless demeanor.

name: Gaisei
text:
-In a word, a world of constant resource scarcity,
and survival of the fittest.
That is the planet where this unworthy one was born.

name: Gaisei
text:
This unworthy one was raised in an orphanage.
This unworthy one's techniques were learned as martial arts
for self-defense from the director when he was young.

name: Gaisei
text:
Learning the director's teachings, this unworthy one dedicated himself to training.
It was when the martial arts had finally settled into this unworthy one's body.

name: Gaisei
text:
One day, while this unworthy one was away training,
rioters seeking food broke into the orphanage.

Gaisei's expression remained unchanged,
as he continued speaking dispassionately.

name: Gaisei
text:
...The director used to say, as if it were a habit,
"Be strong and kind."
He repeated it many times.

name: Gaisei
text:
However, the result was-
a tragedy where everyone except this unworthy one
lay prostrate on the ground.

name: Orbiter
text:
C-Could it be,
Gaisei's friends too...

name: Gaisei
text:
This unworthy one's strength was insufficient to protect them.
The director's teachings were too "weak" for survival.

name: Gaisei
text:
He learned that those who do not
possess the strength from honing their skills
have no reason to live.

name: Gaisei
text:
To master technique and stand at the pinnacle of strength.
That is all that is necessary to survive in this world.

name: Gaisei
text:
-If a serpent appears on that path,
this unworthy one will become a demon,
even if it means crossing countless corpses.

Throughout, Gaisei's expression remained unchanged,
as he continued the story.

name: Gaisei
text:
Let's return to the main topic.
This unworthy one, having lost his home,
wandered from star to star-

name: Gaisei
text:
One day, when he visited Earth,
he met an "Observer" there.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...You cherished the people
at the orphanage, didn't you?

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
The pain of losing friends or loved ones,
...I understand that too.
And the emptiness that remains afterwards.

name: Yotaro
text:
...So that's what happened.
I didn't know that either.

name: Gaisei
text:
...There's no particular need to elaborate.
However, if it leads to strength,
then that's a different story.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Understood.
Then, it's my turn, I suppose.
I'm not enthusiastic about disclosing information, but...

Saying that, Yotaro
cleared his throat and began speaking.

name: Yotaro
text:
Shortly before I met Gaisei-kun,
my "Observer" abilities went berserk.

name: Yotaro
text:
The first time I encountered a monster,
my observation power reacted much stronger than before-

name: Yotaro
text:
...For me, the power of observation is
strongly felt as taste and smell.
It's like I can taste and smell what I see.

name: Yotaro
text:
Monsters taste very unpleasant.
Like the scent of blood or something rotten...
It was so intense that I lost control.

options.text: It's a little different from mine, I guess.

name: Yotaro
text:
It's probably something like that.
I haven't compared my own abilities
with anyone else either.

name: Yotaro
text:
At that time, my relatives and everyone around me
suddenly found out that I was an "Observer."

Yotaro groaned in distress,
then shifted his gaze to [Player].

name: Yotaro
text:
...[Player], you might understand yourself.
The circumstances of an "Observer"'s existence.

name: Yotaro
text:
My surroundings then were very
much exclusively "against Observers".
So, I panicked and fled.

name: Yotaro
text:
I was stuck, unable to return home,
and after deliberating for a few days,
I met Gaisei-kun, who was fighting a villain.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Well, as things happened, I transformed him,
and now we're being pursued as villains, I guess.

name: Yotaro
text:
Since we became villains anyway,
we're doing it properly, and that brings us to the present.
It's like "if you eat the poison, you might as well eat the plate."

options.text: You're still in high school, right?
Yotaro-kun, you are really strong, huh...

text:
Hearing the two's stories,
Pubraseer closed his eyes and nodded.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Thank you, both of you.
I was able to learn a little about you.

name: Yotaro
text:
Yes, I was a little surprised too.
...We haven't really delved into
each other's pasts much.

name: Gaisei
text:
...That's right.
However, the main topic starts here.
-Pubraseer-dono.

Gaisei sharpened his gaze and
looked at Pubraseer.

name: Gaisei
text:
Now what do you say has changed?
Do you truly believe this will lead to strength?

Before Pubraseer could answer,
[Player] turned to Gaisei and Yotaro.

options.text: If our relationship deepens, we can become stronger.
It's an important element in operation.

text:
[Player] urged Yotaro to
transform Gaisei.

name: Yotaro
text:
U-Understood.
Alright, here I go, Gaisei-kun.

Yotaro connected the path and
transformed Gaisei.
-And then, he noticed the change.

name: Yotaro
text:
...I-Indeed.
It was just a little, but there was some change!
I guess you could say the "resolution" increased.

name: Yotaro
text:
The taste and smell are a little clearer than before...
I can understand them better than usual.

name: Gaisei
text:
Oh...
Indeed, my body feels a little lighter
than with previous transformations.

name: Gaisei
text:
Heh, hehehe... Splendid!
Is this... what you call
the power of a team...!?

Gaisei moved his body around
to confirm his own words.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
-Getting to know each other
is the first step as a team.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
If we understand each other better,
we'll be able to adapt flexibly to emergencies.
That will become our weapon.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...And, Orbiter.
Thanks to you bravely
telling us your secret-

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
That has led to the creation of our new team.
Thank you, you're a valuable member of us too.

name: Orbiter
text:
Eh, me?
...Ehehe, really?
Captain praised me!

Orbiter happily
fluttered his ear-like protrusions.

Just then, [Player]'s terminal received a notification
that the maintenance elevator
had arrived on the upper floor.

At [Player]'s words,
everyone braced themselves and nodded.

Wearing the simple spacesuits
provided in the elevator,
the group awaited the elevator's launch.

name: Yotaro
text:
This suit is very thin and decent, isn't it?
It doesn't hinder my body movements either.

name: Gaisei
text:
Hmm, then it shouldn't affect the battle.
...This is quite the impressive technology.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
-Everyone, final check.
The elevator will ascend
to the colony's ceiling.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Just before we reach the ceiling,
Gaisei, please destroy the elevator's end device.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
If that is done successfully,
the elevator will not stop,
and will directly launch into space.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Understood.
No matter how strong it is,
this unworthy one will slice it.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
It depends on your skill, so I'm counting on you.
Once we're in the elevator, until then,
please brace yourselves, no matter what happens.

name: Yotaro
text:
No matter how many monsters appear,
even if the monsters' main body
becomes a complete adult, right?

name: Yotaro
text:
Until it's outside the colony,
we'll keep the monsters contained
inside the elevator, right?

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
That's right, once we're in space,
we'll have to search for the monsters' main body's
weakness in an unstable environment.

name: Orbiter
text:
I'll deploy a gravity field
on the elevator's foothold,
so we can stand, right!?

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Ah, Orbiter.
I want to ask you to do
something only you can do.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
And, whether there's a way to break
through the "superimposed state"...
Please observe the monsters carefully.

options.text: Everyone on the moon is also investigating.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Ah, let us believe in that.
...Because, we've promised everyone!

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...But, if that method isn't found,
and the worst-case scenario occurs-

Pubraseer took a breath,
and then quietly uttered
words that resonated heavily.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
-Under my responsibility and judgment,
I will destroy the reactor myself.
...At that time, leave it to me.

At Pubraseer's words,
everyone nodded without a word.

name: Orbiter
text:
-Finally, it's time.
Captain, the reactor's detachment is ready!

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
...Ah, so there were no problems.
Once you switch to emergency power,
immediately transfer the reactor to the elevator.

name: Orbiter
text:
Yeah, then all you have to do is push the button.
I asked the "person in my heart",
so the procedure is fine!
Pubraseer nodded at Orbiter's words.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Now, our resolve is firm.
-Everyone, are you ready?

name: Yotaro
text:
...No way, when we intruded into the venue,
I never imagined it would come to this-

name: Yotaro
text:
We shall do it!
It's not just like "being in the same boat".
It's also like "sharing the same fate"!

name: Gaisei
text:
-[Player]-dono.
Is this very profound understanding of each other,
the secret to your true strength?

name: Gaisei
text:
...Ah, it's getting enjoyable!
This unworthy one, though impertinent,
cannot suppress his excitement...!

name: Gaisei
text:
I want to test this power as soon as possible.
...Come now, let us proceed!
Here I come, "Observer".

name: Yotaro
text:
It's alright, Gaisei-kun.
It seems we'll be able to fight the monsters soon.

name: Orbiter
text:
Oh, still the same, huh.
Those two are amazing...
Alright, I'm ready too!

name: Orbiter
text:
-Astronauts, no matter how dangerous it is,
are always with Captain!

name: Orbiter
text:
Captain, [Player]!
Let's definitely defeat the monsters!!

At [Player]'s signal,
Orbiter began the emergency power switch and reactor transfer.

As the massive elevator doors opened,
the squirming monsters and the reactor were carried inside.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
-Alright, all preparations are complete.
Now, when all is said and done...
We just need to safely return to this place!

Pubraseer touched the guard of his saber-
the memories of his comrades with his finger,
and then drew its blade.

Five gentle lights
illuminated the path ahead.

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
-Thank you, everyone.
...Now, it's time to depart.
Let's go, [Player]!

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
It's the beginning of a new journey with my new comrades...
-So let's definitely bring back a victory,
where we shall give up on nothing!!
Battle Start

note:
The following text is displayed right inside the battle,
so for the best experience, I'd recommend opening the game right beside it!

name: Gaisei
text:
Ah, the feast has finally begun!
Please ensure this unworthy one's techniques!
Please don't break so easily...!

name: Yotaro
text:
Gaisei-kun, please don't forget your objective, alright!?
Remember to break the terminal once we are at the ceiling!

name: Pubraseer (Rising Moon)
text:
Listen up, everyone!
Until we leave the colony, do
whatever you can to hold back the monsters!

name: Orbiter
text:
Roger, Captain!
Alright, [Player], I'll be
relying on you for the operation!
Trigger condition: Total Damage bar reaches 100%

name: Yotaro
text:
Now's the time, Gaisei-kun!
Destroy the terminal device!

name: Gaisei
text:
-Understood.
Send me your ViewPower, "Observer".
I'll finish it in an instant...!
